Name: Luciform
About the game: What is Luciform? Luciform is a 2D color-based precision platformer. This basically means that in this game you can ONLY interact with the same colored platform as yours and that you will fail MANY times trying to beat the next level. Traverse the world while avoiding hazards and deadly falls, Timing jumps with the utmost precision is a must! *Those whoâ€™ve mastered Super Meat Boy and Celeste will find themselves right at home. This game offers you: Color-based gameplay that will challenge any player Tons of levels to explore, die, and beat Epic fight vs the Red-Eyed Gorila (He kidnapped Luci's family) Two gameplay options, for the casual and the hardcore gamers. Endless & random level to test your skills Online Leaderboards Controller support Four colorblind options
